visualizations.title: Actual vs Predicted Values
visualizations.description: Comparison of actual and predicted rice export quantities with perfect prediction line

visualizations.title: Residual Distribution
visualizations.description: Histogram showing distribution of prediction errors (actual - predicted)

insights: Model has extremely high MAPE (94.78%) indicating poor accuracy
Predictions consistently under-forecast actual values (positive bias)
Only 2 prediction samples available limits reliability assessment
Residuals show no clear pattern but high magnitude errors
data.summary: The Random Forest model with lags produces unreliable forecasts for Bangladesh rice exports with over 94% average error. The model systematically under-predicts and requires significant improvement before practical use.
data.task_answer: The Random Forest model with lags produces unreliable forecasts for Bangladesh rice exports with over 94% average error. The model systematically under-predicts and requires significant improvement before practical use.
